name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **observability** and **telemetry** through tools like **OpenTelemetry**. Adept at enhancing **developer experience** with thorough **documentation** and fostering **community collaboration**. Proven problem-solver and team player, skilled in programming with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Extensive background in both frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, while proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Expertise includes implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Knowledgeable in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong foundation in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
